Reviews.Content: traveled grand del mar business pleasure six son stayed five nights leading thanksgiving 2009 importantly staff treated son special guest accomodating kid friendly includes golf staff wonderful son continues rave trip promoter resort walking jersey

Reviews.Title: “Nothing can be better than this!!!”
Reviews.Author: EstherD
Reviews.Content: amazing travelling lot hotels hotel grounds beautiful hotel built beautifully decorated dont flaw hotel perfect prices drinks food reasonable cafe morning coffee nice pastry sandwich reasonable prices staff nice professional hotel priced cheap definitely return recommend hotel value

Reviews.Title: “Awesome...Great Service...Amazing Experience”
Reviews.Author: Griff88
Reviews.Content: honestly reservation rating hotel neither exaggerated nor underrated hotel stay spotless drive road valet front desk lobby hallway finally night stay honeymoon gift family time share villas grand del mar awesome service times food pricey worth splurge honeymoon staff welcoming perfect highly recommend grand del mar

HotelInfo.Name: The Grand Del Mar
HotelInfo.Address: 5300 Grand Del Mar Court, San Diego, CA 92130
